statements.select:
select 1 as NoUse from Pub_SurveyResult a inner join Pub_SurveyItem c on a.SurveyItemId=c.SurveyItemId left join Pub_Survey b on a.SurveyId=b.SurveyId
SurveyResultId=#SurveyResultId# a.Id=#Id# a.CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.Status=#Status# a.OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# a.OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.SurveyId=#SurveyId# SurveyItemId=#SurveyItemId# SurveyItemValue=#SurveyItemValue# SurveyTargetId=#SurveyTargetId# $WhereClause$
